resources.string: Description could not be downloaded due to some error with the internet.

The markers on the map show volcanoes. 
Click on a marker to read the description of a volcano and see its image.

 All the data and images are taken from the website volcanodiscovery.com.
Location couldn\'t be obtained for an unknown reason.
Your location couldn\'t be obtained due to lack of permission for location services.
You location conldn\'t be obtained, because Location is turned off in settings.
